cat.albirar.template.engine.configuration

Interface PropertiesTemplate


  • public interface PropertiesTemplate

    The property name configuration constants.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Octavi Fornés <ofornes@albirar.cat>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CHARSET_PROPERTY_NAME
      The charset to be used on template engine.
      static Charset DEFAULT_CHARSET
      The global wide default charset.
      static String DEFAULT_CHARSET_NAME
      The global wide default charset name.
      static String[] DEFAULT_DIR_ARRAY
      The default array of directories.
      static String DIR_TEMPLATES_PROPERTY_NAME
      Directory or directories of templates.
      static String ROOT_TEMPLATE_PROPERTIES
      Root for all configuration properties of template engine.
